stage1.definition: To comfort, to console, to reassure
stage1.example: 她的话安慰了我。(tā de huà ān wèi le wǒ) - Her words comforted me.
船停在河岸边。(chuán tíng zài hé àn biān) - The boat is docked by the riverbank.

stage1.definition: Ashore, on the shore, on the bank
stage1.example: 渔民把船拉到岸上。(yú mín bǎ chuán lā dào àn shàng) - The fishermen pulled the boat ashore.
按摩可以缓解肌肉疼痛。(àn mó kě yǐ huǎn jiě jī ròu téng tòng) - Massage can relieve muscle pain.

stage1.definition: To pull out, to draw, to select, to extract
stage1.example: 医生拔了他的智齿。(yī shēng bá le tā de zhì chǐ) - The doctor extracted his wisdom tooth.

stage2.example: 在中国，白酒是一种传统酒。(zài zhōng guó, bái jiǔ shì yī zhǒng chuán tǒng jiǔ) - In China, baijiu is a traditional liquor.
明天我要去拜访我的老师。(míng tiān wǒ yào qù bài fǎng wǒ de lǎo shī) - Tomorrow I'm going to visit my teacher.
这是这本书的最新版。(zhè shì zhè běn shū de zuì xīn bǎn) - This is the latest edition of this book.

stage2.definition: To play a role, to act
stage2.example: 她在电影中扮演一个老师。(tā zài diàn yǐng zhōng bàn yǎn yī gè lǎo shī) - She plays the role of a teacher in the movie.
他的表现很棒！(tā de biǎo xiàn hěn bàng) - His performance was excellent!

stage3.example: 警察包围了那栋建筑。(jǐng chá bāo wéi le nà dòng jiàn zhù) - The police surrounded that building.
这个产品的包装很精美。(zhè gè chǎn pǐn de bāo zhuāng hěn jīng měi) - The packaging of this product is very elegant.

stage3.definition: To defend, to protect, to safeguard
stage3.example: 我们必须保卫祖国。(wǒ men bì xū bǎo wèi zǔ guó) - We must defend our motherland.

stage3.definition: To maintain, to care for, maintenance
stage3.example: 定期保养可以延长汽车的使用寿命。(dìng qī bǎo yǎng kě yǐ yán cháng qì chē de shǐ yòng shòu mìng) - Regular maintenance can extend the service life of a car.

stage3.definition: To repay, to reciprocate, to return a favor
stage3.example: 我想报答他对我的帮助。(wǒ xiǎng bào dá tā duì wǒ de bāng zhù) - I want to reciprocate his help to me.

stage4.definition: To call the police, to report to the police, to sound an alarm
stage4.example: 如果你发现可疑情况，请立即报警。(rú guǒ nǐ fā xiàn kě yí qíng kuàng, qǐng lì jí bào jǐng) - If you notice anything suspicious, please call the police immediately.
他总是抱怨工作太辛苦。(tā zǒng shì bào yuàn gōng zuò tài xīn kǔ) - He always complains that work is too hard.
学生们通常背着背包去上学。(xué shēng men tōng cháng bèi zhe bēi bāo qù shàng xué) - Students usually carry backpacks to school.
这部电影讲述了一个悲剧故事。(zhè bù diàn yǐng jiǎng shù le yī gè bēi jù gù shì) - This movie tells a tragic story.
听到这个消息，她感到非常悲伤。(tīng dào zhè gè xiāo xī, tā gǎn dào fēi cháng bēi shāng) - Upon hearing the news, she felt very sad.

stage5.example: 北极是地球最北端的地区。(běi jí shì dì qiú zuì běi duān de dì qū) - The Arctic is the northernmost region of the Earth.
我们应该主动解决问题，而不是被动等待。(wǒ men yīng gāi zhǔ dòng jiě jué wèn tí, ér bú shì bèi dòng děng dài) - We should take initiative to solve problems instead of waiting passively.
年轻一辈应该尊重老一辈。(nián qīng yī bèi yīng gāi zūn zhòng lǎo yī bèi) - The younger generation should respect the older generation.
请本人到场签字。(qǐng běn rén dào chǎng qiān zì) - Please come in person to sign.
他的鼻子很高。(tā de bí zi hěn gāo) - He has a high nose.

stage6.example: 比方说，如果下雨，我们就不去了。(bǐ fāng shuō, rú guǒ xià yǔ, wǒ men jiù bú qù le) - For example, if it rains, we won't go.
这个行业在经济中的比重越来越大。(zhè gè háng yè zài jīng jì zhōng de bǐ zhòng yuè lái yuè dà) - The proportion of this industry in the economy is getting bigger and bigger.
我们应该彼此尊重。(wǒ men yīng gāi bǐ cǐ zūn zhòng) - We should respect each other.
他必会来的。(tā bì huì lái de) - He will certainly come.
你必须完成这项工作。(nǐ bì xū wán chéng zhè xiàng gōng zuò) - You must complete this task.

stage7.definition: After all, when all is said and done
stage7.example: 他毕竟是个孩子，不懂这些事。(tā bì jìng shì gè hái zi, bù dǒng zhè xiē shì) - After all, he's just a child and doesn't understand these things.

stage7.definition: To close, to conclude, to lower the curtain
stage7.example: 会议已经闭幕了。(huì yì yǐ jīng bì mù le) - The conference has concluded.
奥运会闭幕式非常精彩。(ào yùn huì bì mù shì fēi cháng jīng cǎi) - The closing ceremony of the Olympic Games was very spectacular.
两国边境地区很和平。(liǎng guó biān jìng dì qū hěn hé píng) - The border areas between the two countries are very peaceful.
他正在编辑一本新书。(tā zhèng zài biān jí yì běn xīn shū) - He is editing a new book.

stage8.example: 她是一位经验丰富的编辑。(tā shì yī wèi jīng yàn fēng fù de biān jí) - She is an experienced editor.
最近工作时间有变动。(zuì jìn gōng zuò shí jiān yǒu biàn dòng) - There have been changes in working hours recently.
这个新设施为居民提供了很多便利。(zhè gè xīn shè shī wéi jū mín tí gōng le hěn duō biàn lì) - This new facility provides many conveniences for residents.
他给我留了一张便条。(tā gěi wǒ liú le yī zhāng biàn tiáo) - He left me a note.
这个设计便于使用。(zhè gè shè jì biàn yú shǐ yòng) - This design is easy to use.

stage9.example: 这家宾馆服务很好。(zhè jiā bīn guǎn fú wù hěn hǎo) - The service at this hotel is very good.

stage9.definition: Cake, cookie, pastry, flat round cake
stage9.example: 这种饼很甜。(zhè zhǒng bǐng hěn tián) - This kind of cake is very sweet.
孩子们都喜欢吃饼干。(hái zi men dōu xǐ huān chī bǐng gān) - Children all like to eat cookies.
这种病毒很容易传播。(zhè zhǒng bìng dú hěn róng yì chuán bō) - This virus is easily transmitted.
小心，别打破玻璃。(xiǎo xīn, bié dǎ pò bō li) - Be careful, don't break the glass.

stage10.example: 他每天都更新他的博客。(tā měi tiān dōu gèng xīn tā de bó kè) - He updates his blog every day.
世界博览会将在上海举行。(shì jiè bó lǎn huì jiāng zài shàng hǎi jǔ xíng) - The World Exposition will be held in Shanghai.
他是物理学博士。(tā shì wù lǐ xué bó shì) - He has a Ph.D. in Physics.
这个博物馆收藏了很多古代艺术品。(zhè gè bó wù guǎn shōu cáng le hěn duō gǔ dài yì shù pǐn) - This museum has collected many ancient art pieces.
这个团队的防守很薄弱。(zhè gè tuán duì de fáng shǒu hěn bó ruò) - The defense of this team is very weak.

stage11.definition: To disregard, to ignore, regardless of
stage11.example: 他不顾一切地追求自己的梦想。(tā bú gù yī qiè de zhuī qiú zì jǐ de mèng xiǎng) - He pursued his dream regardless of everything.
这种天气对比赛很不利。(zhè zhǒng tiān qì duì bǐ sài hěn bú lì) - This weather is very unfavorable for the competition.
他等得不耐烦了。(tā děng dé bú nài fán le) - He became impatient with waiting.
不幸的是，他们的房子在火灾中被烧毁了。(bú xìng de shì, tā men de fáng zi zài huǒ zāi zhōng bèi shāo huǐ le) - Unfortunately, their house was burned down in the fire.
学好一门外语不易。(xué hǎo yī mén wài yǔ bú yì) - It's not easy to learn a foreign language well.

stage12.definition: To compensate, to make up for
stage12.example: 公司会补偿你的损失。(gōng sī huì bǔ cháng nǐ de sǔn shī) - The company will compensate for your loss.
政府给农民提供补贴。(zhèng fǔ gěi nóng mín tí gōng bǔ tiē) - The government provides subsidies to farmers.
我不曾去过北京。(wǒ bú céng qù guò běi jīng) - I have never been to Beijing.
这件事情不得了！(zhè jiàn shì qíng bù dé liǎo) - This matter is extremely serious!

stage12.definition: I don't deserve this (humble expression when praised)
stage12.example: 您过奖了，我不敢当。(nín guò jiǎng le, wǒ bú gǎn dāng) - You're too kind, I don't deserve such praise.

stage13.example: 不良习惯会影响健康。(bù liáng xí guàn huì yǐng xiǎng jiàn kāng) - Bad habits will affect health.
在这种情况下，意外是不免的。(zài zhè zhǒng qíng kuàng xià, yì wài shì bú miǎn de) - In this situation, accidents are unavoidable.
我不能不承认我错了。(wǒ bú néng bù chéng rèn wǒ cuò le) - I cannot but admit that I was wrong.

stage13.definition: From time to time, now and then
stage13.example: 他不时看看手表。(tā bú shí kàn kàn shǒu biǎo) - He looked at his watch from time to time.
雨不停地下了三天。(yǔ bù tíng de xià le sān tiān) - It rained continuously for three days.

stage14.example: 这里不许吸烟。(zhè lǐ bú xǔ xī yān) - Smoking is not allowed here.
他的收入不止一万。(tā de shōu rù bú zhǐ yī wàn) - His income is more than ten thousand.
证据不足，无法做出判断。(zhèng jù bú zú, wú fǎ zuò chū pàn duàn) - The evidence is insufficient to make a judgment.
这个部位的肌肉很发达。(zhè gè bù wèi de jī ròu hěn fā dá) - The muscles in this part are well-developed.
你猜我今天看见谁了？(nǐ cāi wǒ jīn tiān kàn jiàn shéi le) - Guess who I saw today?

stage15.definition: To guess, to conjecture, to surmise
stage15.example: 我只能猜测他为什么没来。(wǒ zhǐ néng cāi cè tā wèi shén me méi lái) - I can only guess why he didn't come.
裁判宣布比赛结束。(cái pàn xuān bù bǐ sài jié shù) - The referee announced the end of the match.
公司每月采购一次办公用品。(gōng sī měi yuè cǎi gòu yí cì bàn gōng yòng pǐn) - The company purchases office supplies once a month.
他买彩票中了一等奖。(tā mǎi cǎi piào zhòng le yī děng jiǎng) - He won first prize in the lottery.
这家餐馆的菜很好吃。(zhè jiā cān guǎn de cài hěn hǎo chī) - The food in this restaurant is delicious.

stage16.example: 学校的餐厅很大。(xué xiào de cān tīng hěn dà) - The school's dining hall is very large.
餐饮行业在中国发展很快。(cān yǐn háng yè zài zhōng guó fā zhǎn hěn kuài) - The catering industry is developing rapidly in China.
内蒙古有广阔的草原。(nèi měng gǔ yǒu guǎng kuò de cǎo yuán) - Inner Mongolia has vast grasslands.
我买了一册字典。(wǒ mǎi le yí cè zì diǎn) - I bought a dictionary.
这篇文章结构有层次。(zhè piān wén zhāng jié gòu yǒu céng cì) - This article has a well-structured gradation.

stage17.example: 请把叉子给我。(qǐng bǎ chā zi gěi wǒ) - Please give me the fork.
西餐通常用刀和叉子。(xī cān tōng cháng yòng dāo hé chā zi) - Western meals typically use knives and forks.
这两种产品之间有很大差别。(zhè liǎng zhǒng chǎn pǐn zhī jiān yǒu hěn dà chā bié) - There is a big difference between these two products.
贫富差距在扩大。(pín fù chā jù zài kuò dà) - The gap between rich and poor is widening.

stage17.definition: To insert, to stick in, to plug
stage17.example: 他插了一朵花在花瓶里。(tā chā le yī duǒ huā zài huā píng lǐ) - He inserted a flower into the vase.

stage18.definition: To inquire, to check, to search
stage18.example: 你可以在网上查询航班信息。(nǐ kě yǐ zài wǎng shàng chá xún háng bān xìn xī) - You can check flight information online.
我差点儿迟到了。(wǒ chà diǎnr chí dào le) - I almost arrived late.

stage18.definition: To take apart, to dismantle, to tear down
stage18.example: 拆这个盒子时要小心。(chāi zhè gè hé zi shí yào xiǎo xīn) - Be careful when taking apart this box.

stage18.definition: To tear down, to demolish, to dismantle, to remove
stage18.example: 这座旧楼将被拆除。(zhè zuò jiù lóu jiāng bèi chāi chú) - This old building will be demolished.
旅游是这个地区的重要产业。(lǚ yóu shì zhè gè dì qū de zhòng yào chǎn yè) - Tourism is an important industry in this region.

stage19.example: 这条河的长度约为100公里。(zhè tiáo hé de cháng dù yuē wéi yì bǎi gōng lǐ) - The length of this river is about 100 kilometers.
这个地区的人以长寿闻名。(zhè gè dì qū de rén yǐ cháng shòu wén míng) - People in this region are known for their longevity.
肠道健康对整体健康很重要。(cháng dào jiàn kāng duì zhěng tǐ jiàn kāng hěn zhòng yào) - Intestinal health is important for overall health.
请尝一尝这个新菜。(qǐng cháng yī cháng zhè gè xīn cài) - Please taste this new dish.
我会尝试解决这个问题。(wǒ huì cháng shì jiě jué zhè gè wèn tí) - I will attempt to solve this problem.

stage20.example: 厂长正在开会。(chǎng zhǎng zhèng zài kāi huì) - The factory director is having a meeting.
婚礼的场面很感人。(hūn lǐ de chǎng miàn hěn gǎn rén) - The scene at the wedding was very moving.

stage20.definition: To advocate, to initiate, to propose
stage20.example: 政府倡导环保意识。(zhèng fǔ chàng dào huán bǎo yì shí) - The government advocates environmental awareness.

stage20.definition: To surpass, to exceed, to transcend
stage20.example: 她的成绩超越了所有人的期望。(tā de chéng jì chāo yuè le suǒ yǒu rén de qī wàng) - Her results transcended everyone's expectations.
车主需要缴纳停车费。(chē zhǔ xū yào jiǎo nà tíng chē fèi) - Car owners need to pay parking fees.

stage21.definition: To call, to address as, to weigh
stage21.example: 人们称他为英雄。(rén men chēng tā wéi yīng xióng) - People call him a hero.
他获得了'最佳教师'的称号。(tā huò dé le 'zuì jiā jiào shī' de chēng hào) - He received the title of 'Best Teacher'.
我们需要控制生产成本。(wǒ men xū yào kòng zhì shēng chǎn chéng běn) - We need to control production costs.
